Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” (1947) and “Farewell” (1959). I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was originally a novel that French film-maker Bertrand Blier adapted for the screen,, starring Gérard Depaard.
